value.message: Variable name 'f' is a single-character abbreviation used outside of a loop context.
value.suggestion: Rename 'f' to a more descriptive name such as 'feedbackItem' in reduce/filter/map callbacks.

value.message: CRUD operations (e.g., completeDemo, getDemoMetrics) use demoId from client without verifying resource ownership or authorization.
value.suggestion: Add backend authorization logic to verify that the requesting user owns or is permitted to access the demoId resource before proceeding.
